column4: Hey everyone, I somehow set everything in my system folder to open with VLC Media Player, and now I cannot get into any folders. Please help
cant get into them what way?
On the panel, or through the browser, It always tries to open them with VLC
tries to open files, or directories with vlc?
Directories, I cant even get to the files. When I click on the "home Folder" icon, and others, such as storage media, It attempts to open the foldier with VLC
so, for example, under your home, the dirs open with vlc?
No, It attempts to open "home" with VLC, I cant even get to the dirs.
open a terminal, and type sudo ls -lf /
can you post on paste.ubuntulinux.nl what it tells you?
it shows all my dirs, and numbers to go with them
lets use paste.ubuntulinux.nl from now on.
try ls -l ~ and paste on the web site.
right, man. For the record, I use kubuntu, but they differ only in the KDE
I put dabaR in the "name" input box, correct
anything will do.
alright, I posted
I would like to see ls -l ~, not ls -lf ~
alright, done
is that correct
have you asked in #kubuntu?
yes, no reply. The two are basically the same
I understand, it is just likely something to do with kde. since it looks fine under the hood.
alright man, thanks for your help
you can use the terminal for now.
